replication_study.hypothesis: Higher individual-level concern about immigration (imm_concern index) is associated with greater distrust in parliament (trstprl_rev), controlling for the same individual-level and country-level covariates used in the original analysis.

data_plan.dataset_identifier: data_clean_5pct.rds (replication_data folder) â€” processed 5% cleaned sample; also data_imp_5pct.rds (imputed data)

Python translation of the R analysis: reads data_clean_5pct.rds and fits a mixed-effects model, writes model_summaries.txt.

codebase.notes: The Python script uses pyreadr and statsmodels MixedLM; weights support is approximate.
